name: experimentally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves scientific tests: The implications were recognized but could not be experimentally tested. This phenomenon has been demonstrated experimentally.
in an uncertain way, without being sure what the result will be: She ran a finger experimentally along a shelf and examined the dust that piled up beneath it. She raised herself from her pillows and stretched experimentally. See
experimental
More examplesFewer examplesThese quantities have been experimentally measured.The new power is being introduced experimentally in ten cities. He touched the book in front of him experimentally, with one finger.
